title: Riot Staff ~ Please duo with me for my 1000 ranked game!
body:
I missed the chance to play with a Rioter for my 1000 normal games but now I'm just 5 games from 1000 ranked games!
Proof: http://imgur.com/rQZ2kup
I'm hoping to do this today at around 7-8pm PST (I should have 999 by then since I only have 1 class today).
Thanks in advance!
Edit: It also doesn't matter what rank!

replies.body: I'm not sure if I would be a good candidate but it would be my pleasure to play with you for your 1000th rank game! Let's make it a win. ;)

DARN! If only I'd checked this an hour ago. I just reached 1000 wins and with that I earned Platinum II. 

If you're still interested, it would be awesome to play a dominion/aram/normals/3's with you!

My viewers would love it too! [twitch.tv/verciau](twitch.tv/verciau). They always ask me if I can get a rioter on stream!
Please add King Neo, I will gladly play with you and celebrate your 1000th ranked game!
Like I said above, unfortunately I popped the cherry early however I would love for you to join us for a game! ADDED!
I got Morgageddon for my 1000th ranked win this season :D twas quite a fun game too.
He was going to play with me for my 1000th normals too but there is some algorithm of normal games to which I could not see and therefore was no where near 1000 normal games!
